title: Thrill3r - Platinum Tier Streamer who wants to help you improve there overall gameplay! :)
body:
Hey ladies & gents!

Ever felt like Rito is purposely holding back your true talent? 

Stuck in what we call "elo hell?"

Have all the questions but no one to answer them?

Never fear, Thrill3r is here - As a fellow Kiwi living in Australia, I want to help YOU and be the person you can enjoy watching and learning this amazing game at the same time FROM THE SAME OCEANIC SERVER!

We have all started at the bottom (Bronze 5) and some of us have managed to climb through and some of us have not - BUT THAT IS FINE! If I and so many other summoners can do it, YOU CAN TOO! :)

I have 4 or so years experience playing League Of Legends and achieved top rank of Platinum  1 (Peak) Last season with 100+ Ping on ADSL - Now have recently moved to a Fiber Optic Home in the last few days I can finally start climbing whilst streaming and helping you improve as well.

I am now streaming on the OCE server every night from Monday to Friday from 6:00pm - Late, and Saturday/Sunday (most of the day - Depending on dad duties lol)

Looking forward to seeing you on the rift!

Yah boy, Thrill3r
twitch.tv/Thrill3rrrr

replies.body: Bump - Will be on tonight with that 2pac sw@g lol
